title: Short courses
description: The constituent Departments within the Faculty of Medicine participate in and help in coordinating a variety of short courses across a range of themes and topics.
cleaned_text: Short courses Short courses offered within the Faculty of Medicine We offer a range of short courses, some in collaboration with the College's Centre for Continuing Professional Development (CPD). These programmes offer focused study in a variety of research and healthcare subject areas.
